name: functional
description: - Why functional?   - because JS can (functions are first class citizens)   - immutability   - reuse just what you need   - its safe   - looks good (and that's good)   - testing pure functions is easy peasy :metal:   - it is fun :D - Inheritance vs. Composition :muscle: - Functional methods: the bad, the good, the awesome - Libs   - [Rambda](http://ramdajs.com/) :metal:   - [Folktale](http://folktalejs.org/) :nerd: - Resources   - [awesome functional programming](https://github.com/xgrommx/awesome-functional-programming)   - [awesome fp js](https://github.com/stoeffel/awesome-fp-js)   - [workshop](https://github.com/timoxley/functional-javascript-workshop). _beginners_ - Real world usage examples   - React & Redux :thinking:   - Node
